roleset.name: degrading and destroying of myelin sheath covering nerves

example.name: Arg0 and Arg1
example.text: John's symptoms were in part caused by his disease progressively demyelinating the nerves in his feet.

example.name: Adjectival usage: Do Not Tag!
example.text: Is there an association between monoclonal gammopathy of uncertain significance and chronic inflammatory demyelinating polyneuropathy?

example.name: Arg1
example.text: The demyelination of Seth's foot nerves caused lack of balance and coordination.

roleset.note: DEMYELINATE-V NOTES: Based on data in medical QA corpus (Framed by Anwen 07/20/10). Do Not Tag adjectival usages! (from demyelinate.101-v)
DEMYELINATION-N NOTES: Corresponds with demyelinate.101. Framed by anwen april 2011 (from demyelination.01-n)
Look out for adjectival usages (from demyelinating.01-n)
